name: Fast Cache Cleaner
description: Cache clearing app!  Clears all the caches.  This app is recommended for those who are focusing on speed. This app is absolutely free and without any troublesome advertisements. A must-have app to easily maintain your smartphone.  When the cache is cleared - Improves processing speed. - Battery lasts longer. - Releases the memory compressed by unnecessary files.  Recommended for those who want: - An app with fast processing speed - No troublesome settings - An app with no advertisements - A non-resident app for Clear cache - No need to set apps to exclude (The app seeks to be extremely easy-to-use by eliminating settings.)   Notes on deleting cache Not all app caches can be deleted. Can delete the cache of an app that has a cache file accessible from an external app. Cant delete cache for apps that arent designed that way. This is an Android specification, not an app issue or bug.
